alert.note: Alert for Ohio (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 08 at 6:29AM EST until March 08 at 8:24PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Rough River near Dundee affecting Ohio County. .Heavy rain from the past few days have caused the river to rise. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rough River near Dundee. * WHEN...Until this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:45 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 27.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 4:45 AM CST Tuesday was 27.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 10.1 feet early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued this afternoon.
